name: Triple Catch Triple Cash
description:
A short game where you control 3 characters through different mechanics while collecting cash and avoiding bombs all in 60 seconds! Accept the challenge and you'll get a chance to win thousands of fake money! Play alone or with your friend/s.

Submission to the Practice Circle Jam with optional theme "multiple main characters".

Q - Quit Game

Feedback, suggestions, questions, etc. are much appreciated! 

Creator's Experience:

Warning: Kinda Long

I'm glas and I'm a lazy bum who finally decided to learn about game dev and programming this quarantine. This is a little backstory to how I made this game. So I was scrolling through the jam calendar and saw this jam which seemed very welcoming to beginners like me. After a "few" days, I suddenly realized I hadn't done anything for the jam and that there were 2 and a half days left. Naturally, instead of just accepting that I probably shouldn't rush a game in that short amount of time, well, I did just that. I actually had a different first idea I wanted to do for the jam, which I spent a good few hours on brainstorming and conceptualizing characters, but I realized it was too ambitious. After trying out my game generator, I got the idea of using different controls for diff. characters which seemed simple enough to do and then I kept adding some ingredients to it. Well, that's all strangers, enjoy the game! 

All art, code and music (except for sfx  - zapsplat, myinstants) was made by glas.
